Name: Dreamily
About the game: Description The game is called 'Dreamily', Survival game. A pleasant atmosphere, a relaxed musical accompaniment will allow you to relax during the game. There are several types of dangerous monsters in the game, although they will not pursue you, but if you get close to them, you can suffer !!! You play for a man in a dream, a weapon is a pillow, and you need to destroy as many monsters as possible. Good luck! FUTURES It is planned to introduce maps Interesting gameplay Beautiful graphics Easy and precise control A variety of monsters! Randomly generated events! Achievements of 100+
